body.name: Coast Rider Stroller Canopy for Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller, Grey

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 29 - March 1 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ALL THE PROTECTION YOUR CHILD NEEDS: The Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller Canopy is ideal to protect your child from the harsh sun rays or rain when you are on the go.
EASY TO ATTACH: The Canopy attaches instantly to your Dream On Me Coast Rider stroller in a snap. All set to head out and experience the world with you and your little one in a jiffy.
DURABLE FABRIC: The Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller Canopy is made with high-quality waterproof fabric. To clean, simply wipe with mild soap and water.
FINISH OPTIONS: The Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller Canopy is available in five stylish finishes. Change according to the seasons or your taste.
PRODUCT SPECS: The canopy is compatible for use with the Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller ONLY (sold separately). Product dimensions are 23” L x 14.5” W x 5” H with a weight of 1 Lb.
body.description: The Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller Canopy is the perfect protection from rain and sun as you and your bub experience the world together! Compatible with the Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller only (sold separately), it attaches instantly to your stroller in a snap. The Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller Canopy is made with high-quality waterproof fabric. To clean, simply wipe with mild soap and water. The Dream On Me Coast Rider Stroller Canopy is available in five stylish finishes. Change according to the seasons or your taste! Product dimensions are 23” L x 14.5” W x 5”H with weight of 1 Lb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product of the stroller which doesn't has canopy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product provided enough shade for my grandson.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to the perfect stroller
reviews.reviewText: I tell people about the stroller everywhere I go, and the sunshade is just icing on the cake. At least four people have bought the stroller after lengthy conversations with me– – three were strangers lol, but I can’t help talking about it. It’s just that good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller for my 43 lb 3 year old !
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good so far. Can’t speak for those that said the handle isn’t sturdy because mine sure is ! I’m only having difficulty figuring out how to attach the canopy. But other than that, all is GREAT !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needs one more position
reviews.reviewText: Used this for a week in disney with my 7 year old. The stroller was great. The shade worked great, until it was time to fold the stroller with it attached. The shade would not fold flat with the stroller. After 2 days of holding it flat while folded it wore the plastic down enough it would fold flat and stay without me holding it. This also allowed me to fold the shade down behind the seat at night or while indoors which let me see directly in front and maneuver easier. All in all a great addition and well worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: THOUGHTSCANOPY WAS EASY to connect and it’s sturdy, doesn’t feel cheap. The first day we used it was a rainy day in NYC and we put a stroller cover over it and it worked great. Love it.Hate that they sell this thing separately from the stroller makes no sense other than to bank more bucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible!! Very poorly made! Not good quality.
reviews.reviewText: I honestly have never been so frustrated with something like this before. This thing is ridiculously made terrible quality. I can already see the seams of it ripping. I got a replacement because the first one was no way to put the tiny straw through I hurt my hand multiple times trying and so did my family members when they attempted to help me. Just the fact that you have to put a STRAW in a stroller shade is the most ridiculous thing I’ve had to do. I had the same problem with the replacement and eventually got them into both sides and it STILL LOOKS HORRIBLE. I need a canopy for this stroller either way and now I have to use it when it looks horrible. This company should do better. I didn’t really like the stroller either since I have to hurt my hands just to open and close it and now this?! I would like a full refund!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m pretty sure I bought the pink. But whatever
